info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 29 at 3:25AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH EXPANDED TO INCLUDE ALL MAIN HAWAIIAN ISLANDS THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Maui, Molokai, Lanai, Kahoolawe, and the Big Island. * WHEN...From this morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
